#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int n=1,m=1,c=0,i,j,k,l;
	char field[101][101];
	char mine[101][101];
	while(n!=0&&m!=0){
		scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
		if(n==0&&m==0)
		break;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			for(j=0;j<m;j++){
				field[i][j]='0';}}
		c++;
		for(k=0;k<n;k++)
		scanf("%s",mine[k]);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			for(j=0;j<m;j++){
				if(mine[i][j]=='*'){
					field[i][j]='*';
					if(i-1!=-1&&j-1!=-1&&field[i-1][j-1]!='*')
					field[i-1][j-1]++;
					if(i-1!=-1&&field[i-1][j]!='*')
					field[i-1][j]++;
					if(j-1!=-1&&field[i][j-1]!='*')
					field[i][j-1]++;
					if(i+1!=n&&j+1!=n&&field[i+1][j+1]!='*')
					field[i+1][j+1]++;
					if(i+1!=n&&field[i+1][j]!='*')
					field[i+1][j]++;
					if(j+1!=n&&field[i][j+1]!='*')
					field[i][j+1]++;
					if(j-1!=-1&&i+1!=n&&field[i+1][j-1]!='*')
					field[i+1][j-1]++;
					if(i-1!=-1&&j+1!=n&&field[i-1][j+1]!='*')
					field[i-1][j+1]++;
				}
			}
		}
		printf("Field #%d: \n",c);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			for(j=0;j<m;j++){
				printf("%c",field[i][j]);
			}
			printf("\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
